commit.message:
optimization continuation byte validation of strings containing multibyte chars

```
old, -O2, x86-64
test str::str_validate_emoji                                    ... bench:       4,606 ns/iter (+/- 64)

new, -O2, x86-64
test str::str_validate_emoji                                    ... bench:       3,837 ns/iter (+/- 60)
```
